title: ‚ú® Spark Director+  [Psychological Safety] ‚ú®
message: üí° " Psychological Safety is a shared belief that one will not be punished or humiliated for speaking up with ideas, questions, concerns or mistakes.‚Äù ‚Äì Amy Edmondson.     üìä In 2012, Google embarked on a quest to build the Perfect Team. An initiative code-named Project Aristotle studied hundreds of Google‚Äôs teams to better understand why some stumbled, whilst others soared. Google‚Äôs extensive research corroborated the importance of Amy Edmondson's coined phrase, discovering that Psychological Safety is a paramount component of High Performing Teams.   ‚ö†Ô∏è Building a fearless organization that truly embraces psychological safety will leverage the benefits of Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI), attracting and retaining a diverse environment of talented individuals, in addition to promoting innovation, connection, and a sense of belonging (DEIB).   üöÄ Spark Director+ is a self-discovery journey within an overarching Leadership Learning Track, offered to Directors and Senior Directors who manage teams of all sizes.   üì¢ Please join me in applauding our enthusiastic Workhuman Executive Leaders who participated in this month‚Äôs Psychological Safety module: Adam, Amy, Andrew, Colleen, Jason, Jeff, Laura, Linda, Martina, Michelle Drozdowski, Michelle Lane, Michelle McDaid, Niall, Rich, Tyler, Varun, and Zhennaa, thank you for your valued partnership as Psychological Safety Ambassadors. Warmest gratitude, Donna Louise Fitzpatrick.    üëâ FEEL FREE TO RECOGNIZE AND CHAMPION OUR EXECUTIVE LEADERS VIA THIS LINK: https://www.linkedin.com/posts/coachdonnalouise_google-projectaristotle-psychologicalsafety-activity-7006208407187681280-Pvxr?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop

title: You were ON with Organon!
message: Sheri, for the last few months you have executed with grace through a challenging situation with a client who has pushed the bounds of the WHC into a new frontier; agile pay (Spot Awards) tied to Conversations (specifically awarded after a manager check-in with their direct report).  When the client gave us challenging feedback late Thursday during their renewal negotiation, you immediately stepped in leading our product, client, accounting and strategy teams to think as one unified team.  The vision, to deliver to the client exactly what they needed, which has changed the course of the renewal discussions with their leadership teams! You delivered to the Organon Talent and Rewards executives today with confidence and commitment; two things they needed to hear and feel to move forward.  Thank you for leading us through choppy waters and for challenging our teams to think outside the box with a true Respect to Customer approach.  Truly remarkable Leadership!  Leslie and Ro

title: Bring the House Down
message: Sheri and Amanda - Knowing Christopher Cardarelli's love of theater, I had to steal a theater term to convey the amazing experience - truly a MOMENT THAT MATTERS in all caps - for his 25th anniversary with Merck. Sheri, you convened us back in the summer to ensure we did something amazing to commemorate this special occasion. Amanda - there were so many special touches you facilitated from the Tunde Oyeneyin cameo, signed book, the caricature, the video, it all came together in a big way. I can't say it better than Christopher himself:   "On the drive home from my offsite today, I phoned my wife to tell her how much I could not wait to share the video you all sent to me.  She told me that two packages had just arrived for me.  We opened them together when I got home and honestly, she said to me, ‚ÄúWow, they are so thoughtful and really seem to know you well!  I am blown away!  I am really digging the caricature full of images of things I enjoy so much ‚Äì to cook, homemade pasta, Trader Joe‚Äôs, my little pooch Maya and a nice glass of wine!  The new pasta machine is over the top!  I hope one day we can all get to make some together ‚Äì I would love that opportunity!  You all really made today very memorable for me!   Throughout the video, your words of appreciation and gratitude really made me blew me away.  The photos of moments that represent highlights of our work and fun together were awesome too!   I had Olivia and Dale watch the video with me and they felt so proud of and for me!  It really was an incredible moment to share with them!  My Olivia was so surprised and excited at Tunde‚Äôs message to me in the beginning only to freak out at the callout to her personally toward the end.  I cannot even describe Olivia‚Äôs reaction to the personalized message/signed copy of Tunde‚Äôs book ‚Äì off the chart!    Thank you all so very much!  I feel so blessed to be connected to all of you and I look forward to 2023"

title: Sony Presentation
message: Thank you all for your work on the Sony pitch yesterday, it was true teamwork!  We had many calls to prep and ensure we had clear themes we wanted to share in terms of partnership, global & product capability and future experience.  James & Jamie thank you for the collaboration & being part of the yesterday‚Äôs meeting. Guil, it was delightful, to hear you called out as wonderful by the program team during the meeting, they love working with you and value your knowledge and partnership! Thank you for the work you did updating the numbers slides and sharing all your knowledge of Sony with the wider team so we could best prepare. Nuvs thank you for your thoughtfulness with the topics and the slides, your expertise and knowledge was well received. Corinne, thank you for joining us and being a wonderful partner. Your research and enthusiasm for the discussion and our approach was hugely valued & appreciated. Cam it was a shame you missed the meeting but time in Argentina is well deserved, thank you for all the prep work and support.  It takes a village & I am fortunate to be part of this one!

title: Season of Giving Your All
message: This past week, all of you came together to share in the commitment to our customers, our company and each other!  It was so inspiring to see each and every one of you show up with passion and a desire to collectively learn from each other.  We spent time building momentum around how we unlock doors with executives, gaining full adoption of the Workhuman cloud, reaching new users on the platform, increasing investment and renewing our vows with longstanding customers.  The engagement that I saw when we discussed the roles everyone plays in supporting our customers, how you partner together and the achievements that have come from those partnerships was profound.  As we often hear, it takes a village - well I'm so PROUD to be a part of this village.  The commitment demonstrated in these sessions together is what makes us great and will continue to lead us into a bright 2023, no matter the challenges, we have each other!  In the spirit of the season of giving, thank you for giving it your all.  I look forward to more time together and a huge cheers to all of you!

title: Collaboration at its finest
message: Kathryn and Amy, I wanted to take a moment to thank you both for being incredibly collaborative partners. The success of our webinars this year would not have been possible without you. You‚Äôve not only secured compelling speakers, but you‚Äôve been instrumental in setting up the story and foundation for each and every event, and have played a critical role in ensuring that every speaker was set up for success. Thank you for all the amazing work, for the collaborative spirit, and for being dependable, strategic partners.

title: That's a wrap on 2022 live webinars!!!
message: Amy, Kathryn, Maya - I can't express how appreciative I am of all your support this year on webinars. Reflecting back on the past year and what we accomplished is truly something to be SO proud of. You all are absolute rock stars at what you do and I've learned so much from each of you. I'm so thankful to be able to work alongside such smart and talented people who are always putting out the best of best content to ensure we give our audience something meaningful! We finished the year strong with 16 webinars, 16!!! Those 16 webinars gave us a total of 35K+ responses, 11K+ attendees, 10K+ MQLs, 600+ meetings and over 100 opportunities valuing at ~$74.5M!! I'm so proud of this team and cannot wait to see the goals we crush next year. Thank you again for all your effort in making the webinar program a huge success.

title: Nevertheless
message: ...she persisted. I was appreciating Lisa and her focus on Events (including process ;-), when I realized this is the first time we've had a dedicated, truly dedicated, CD of Events. Jen and Liu had the title but always with other competing priorities. You championed for this role for... years. Thank you for your persistence - identifying the need and defining this important role. Cheers!

title: Making the Impossible, Possible
message: Marketing team and partners - Congratulations on achieving a monumental milestone of 50,000 Marketing Qualified Leads! By the numbers, this milestone represents two-year growth from 8,000 in 2020 to 50,636 (and climbing)! That‚Äôs an incredible 532% increase in demand growth in just two years' time!     The journey to this massive accomplishment started back in October 2021 with thoughtful and intense demand and brand planning, pragmatism of breaking big goals into smaller channel by quarter forecasts and plans, followed by superior discipline around performance management week on week, and critically aided by our partnerships with Sales Ops, Analytics, and Enterprise Architecture.     From web leads, to webinars, social surrounds, press amplification, Spotlights, and countless hours refining the leads scoring and ingestion models, this was a department wide effort through and through. As impressive as this achievement of goal (ahead of schedule) is, more than the outcome itself, it‚Äôs demonstrative of your collective discipline, collaboration, and commitment to quality execution. We‚Äôve learned much from this journey that will inform and enable success in fy23 and beyond.     On behalf of the Senior Exec Leadership Team, congratulations on making the impossible, possible!    -Tom

title: Amazing Team Effort
message: I just wanted to highlight the thoughtful planning and execution by this team that accumulated in into a very productive ADP account review. All our preparation paid off! The review took place on their exact anniversary of 7 years with Workhuman, purely coincidence but great timing.  Thank you to Shelly and the Workhuman practice team for putting together a well-designed slide and zoom background to celebrate.   Right off the bat, the program owner Trusha mentioned how appreciative she is of the many hands within Workhuman that provide support to their myMoment program. Trusha and Karen also provided the following feedback at the end of the review that they love how intuitive our product is and easy for employees to use (they've not heard any complaints from employees yet!). Additionally that it was very informative, full of "ooo's and ah's, and are open to further program design enhancements and discussion. As a result we were able to get their buy-in to schedule a design lab to hopefully make some impactful changes to their program and to continue to expand our partnership.   Shoutouts go to Sherri for the impactful strategy discussion and thought leadership, Nuvs for highlighting our product integration and roadmap in a way that focused on ADP's needs, Morgan for diving into the details of our Workhuman cloud and the many functions it can provide, the Workhuman IQ team who told the ADP story and for which the customer was very appreciative of, and last but not least to Claire for all the assistance with helping me prep for my first account review!

title: Amazing Initiative!

With gratitude (albeit a few days after Sept 21 :) -C

title: Weekend dig for photos
message: Late Friday we learned from Sanofi that they wanted to hear our ideas for recognition and their sponsorship of the Paris 2024 Olympics. Tom, you had the brilliant idea of a co-branded gratitude bar, which led us to looking for inspiring images. Knowing our proclivity for photos, I reached out to the crack WH Live team on Saturday morning, and winning pics were found. We used the images Jill and JenP that you dug up and sent, with feedback "you 100% met the brief in terms of the Olympic brief". The speed and urgency that this team responded was critical in pushing us closer to becoming a client. Thank you to everyone for taking the time to act with urgency. It mattered!

title: The Power of Partnerships!
message: WOW!! Just WOW!! Sheri, the Queen of Creating Opportunities & Expanding Partnerships! You did once again with Merck. Your day in and day out approach to leading from the front with Merck continues to pay off in spades. It's obvious to Merck you are OBSESSED with their success, are accountable, transparent, infuse Inspire into all facets of their Total Rewards strategy and connect all of the dots for them. No better testament than today's "ask" from Christopher Cardarelli and Merck's DE&I team. This month the Global Diversity, Equity and Inclusion Extended HR Leadership team organized a month long series of webinars to support key topics employees are most interested in. Christopher immediately thought to pair Workhuman with Merck's pay equity team and create a Power of Equitable and Inclusive Rewards webinar to kick off the month long series. Bam!! The curated content, a slice of the Gratitude Summit, married perfectly with the pay equity topic. Gratitude and Recognition I'd say actually stole the show. Most of the Q&A questions centered around wanting more best practices, advise, how to's on Inspire and recognizing others! The frequency of recognition stuck a cord! It's because of the strong relationships built these opportunities surface and present themselves! You were a STELLAR presenter and had the audience hanging on your every word. Christopher texted me directly after the session and said "That was phenomenal." High praise!! He listens to Merck execs all day long!  WAHOO!! Joyce, your name and Merck go hand in hand. You have been Merck's primary consultant post launch and integral to the success in the last 5 years. Thanks for your support in today's session and all of your contributions and achievements. An Inspire moments happens every 23 seconds in a company the size of Merck! Think about that stat!! That's a lot of inspiring and infusing recognition into the DNA of the culture. You both are ROCK STARS!!!

title: Gratitude Attitude Queens
message: Traci and Sheri, I'm fresh off the world-class Gratitude summit you presented for more than 350 Merck employees and still feeling energized by the experience! Leveraging the deep partnership with Christopher, you were able to provide the positive foundation to their discussion on rewards at Merck, talk of the deep impact INSPIRE has had over the past five years, and keep up the energy with this diverse audience. While your speaking efforts and championing of INSPIRE seemed effortless, I know it took of hours of refining the approach with Christopher as well as several test sessions to ensure the seamless experience that Merck employees got to view today. Not only that, there were many hard-hitting questions regarding the other topic presented - pay equity - and the Merck team relied heavily on you two to answer the organic questions coming in from employees to help keep the webinar on track and ending on a high note. It is always a pleasure to witness the two of you as a dynamic duo in action, especially for one of our most strategic clients. Let the reign of Gratitude Attitudes continue!

title: Yesterday
message: Yesterday was a rough day. Especially for most of you who may have had flashbacks of March 2020/San Antonio. You put your heart into building an event. The decision to postpone is not an easy one even if the data tells you want you need to do.  Today you refocussed, on San Diego. Tomorrow and the next and the next - you will pour your heart into leading future Workhuman Live events. I see your dedication to producing nothing but quality events and experiences for attendees. I applaud your courage and leadership in doing what is right for the business. Thank you for communicating to your teams quickly and fielding many questions around next steps. Ready for San Diego!

message: Thank you all for you contribution to our Finance Transformation Workshops. It was a super busy 3 day schedule where we walked through all things Data, Forecasting & Budgeting and Solution Revenue. We have a comprehensive list of next steps and have a clear go-forward position. Thank you all for your energy and commitment to moving this forward. P.S. Huge thanks for the ice cream and ice-cream cake ... AMAZING!

title: Leading from the front!
message: Amy,  You‚Äôre doing an incredible job leading and guiding your team to the ‚Äúpromise land‚Äù. You‚Äôve integrated new team members into the culture and key initiatives, they‚Äôre delivering high quality work wit the results to show, and they‚Äôre having a ton of fun doing it. Your talent and your dedication to Workhuman is remarkable. You always make sure Steve's best interests are at hand and always make sure I am involved. Your sorority poker face brightens my day. title: A spirit of renewal
message: Sheri, I was reflecting on the week just now and on the great work you have been doing these past few weeks in aligning the company to put us in the best place for the Merck renewal. In truth, it has been years of work preparing for this moment but I wanted to particularly highlight your work in the past few weeks. There are so many moving pieces, coaches, initiatives, fires and amazing data to consider and you are like a chess master planning all the right moves.  We're so lucky to have you leading the strategy.  Thank you!

title: SMTP to AWS migration
message: The last few weeks saw the culmination of many months of work with the completion of the migration of all client SMTP/email delivery services to AWS from our last physical data centre. This took a momentous amount of planning and coordination between multiple internal WH teams both Cloud and Client Services and then with our clients themselves. The level of cooperation displayed between all teams ensured, most importantly the uninterrupted delivery of client email which number in the 100s of thousand per day and ultimately the successful delivery of the project and is no small feat. Our new AWS home will allow us to take full advantage of all that AWS has to offer providing a stable and robust platform to build and grow our product upon. Well done to all involved and enjoy your reward!

title: Hang in there, You're doing AMAZING!
message: All, I wanted to take a moment to reflect on the incredible work this team is doing everyday to support our largest customers!  I am beyond proud of each and every single one of you.  The value you each are bringing this organization and our clients is beyond measure.  It is a distinct privilege to get to see you in action, listen to your strategies to support our customers in all the right ways and see you succeed day after day.  It has been a rough go for a while now for a myriad of reasons and you all are absolute warriors.  You inspire and humble me with the creativity, fortitude and determination you all demonstrate.  Thank you for being uniquely you and for the contributions you bring to our customers and Workhuman.  Bravo!

title: Leading us to success!
message: A two-part shout out! Thank you for organizing such a great planning session, today and in June! The agenda was well organized & made it easy to stay on track + breaking out into groups was a helpful way to discuss challenges/collaboration opportunities. Secondly, I really appreciate your feedback style and you taking the time to meet one-on-one to discuss/review. I‚Äôm thrilled to be a part of your team!

Great work

title: Cheers to our First Global Workhuman Partner!
message: Team, THANK YOU for being a part of closing our very first global partner at Workhuman: Qualtrics!  Each of you played an essential role in helping throughout this partnership journey.  Your help brought us to where we needed to be, which included: shaping the story, advising on the process and people that need to be involved, coordinating the meetings, bringing our unique value and capabilities to life through presentations, creating a memorable experience for them, providing technical guidance, and formalizing the partnership through contract.  This partnership is the first of many, and the hard work begins here.  I couldn't have done this without you.  As I arrive at my first anniversary at Workhuman, I feel blessed to work with an amazing group of individuals (who also happen to be a lot of fun!).  Thank you again! ü•Ç #WorkhumanTogether

title: Collaborating to Deliver Quality
message: Amy, Wendy & Kathryn - a huge THANKS to each of you for the above and beyond, tireless support (especially as it overlapped with an already busy Workhuman Live schedule) and coaching over these past many weeks, allowing me to bring my best to our recent Evanta CHRO Keynote. And Lisa, a very special thanks to you for being so collaborative, helping me land finishing touches to my presentation. title: It takes a Workhuman village! (part 2)
message: Last week was the culmination of the efforts by so many to bring the Executive Forum to life at Workhuman Live. Joining the team only 6 weeks before the event, I was blown away by the work ethic, camaraderie, and creativity of everyone involved. Your support, encouragement, and tireless commitment to the finished product (both during the final stretch of planning and onsite) far exceeded anything I could have ever imagined in a team, and your efforts were instrumental in delivering an impactful program for ExF members. Thank you for bringing the vision to life. It was a sincere pleasure to work with you, and I look forward to our continued collaboration.  With the craziness of the event, I fell a bit behind with recognition in the final 2 weeks leading up to the event. Please know - your contributions did not go unnoticed.   SCDs and Sales Teams ‚Äì for your diligent efforts to fill the room and empower the most important Customers and Prospects to join the conversation. These efforts not only contributed to the success of this event, they also helped lay the foundation for future events and further development of our business relationships.   Meghan, Chris W, and Dave ‚Äì for your diligent work facilitating and tracking customer experience and the growth account participation. I appreciate your keen eyes on the process!   Corina and Dana ‚Äì for your collaborative efforts in integrating the Partner Program elements into the ExF experience and for your timely action in helping to lock in details ahead of our internal deadlines. Also, for your leadership and companionship as co-hosts of the Bellyard breakfasts and enthusiasm throughout the onsite experience. Your input during the breakfast conversations added real value to the attendees‚Äô experiences. It was a delight to watch you in action!  With tremendous thanks for your involvement and contribution to this process ‚Äì congratulations on a job well done! Onward to Dublin!

Sarah M., Sarah B., Stacy, Chris ‚Äì for your strategic thinking on continuing the conversation with our ExF audience. Sarah M ‚Äì for attending the ExF sessions and crafting an informative and actionable blog post; Sarah B ‚Äì for compiling a curated stream; Stacy ‚Äì for your logistical wizardry and input on video content elements; Chris ‚Äì for your expertise in capturing moments that will advance our ExF mission  Reid ‚Äì for your outreach efforts to the CNBC Council and the BC CEO Club    Kathryn & Amy ‚Äì for your exceptional work with all-things speaker-related. Kathryn ‚Äì for scheduling the calls with speakers to align on content, for tracking down approved marketing copy and final presentations when agents went M.I.A., and for your commitment to the success of the Exec Forum with everything else on your plate. You are superhuman! Amy ‚Äì for your guidance with the Optimist/Speaker dinner strategy and securing/writing ExF speaker intros ‚Äì thank you!  With tremendous thanks for your involvement and contribution to this process ‚Äì congratulations on a job well done! Onward to Dublin!

title: Turning vision into value
message: From when I started 2 months ago until now, each of you has been instrumental in laying the framework for the evolution of the Executive Forum. Your leadership, advice, and trust in me in such a short time has been humbling and is deeply appreciated. As a group, thank you for your overarching leadership and strategic input throughout my tenure thus far as we begin to harness the potential of the Exec Forum and shape it into an effective tool for achieving our business goals. Individually, I have been moved by:   Jill, Jeff & Richard ‚Äì your fearless leadership, patience, flexibility, and guidance along the way, when your plates are beyond full. You continue to rise to the challenge every day, and it is inspiring to watch.  Eileen, Jen R, Tom & Celia ‚Äì your vision and commitment to the success of the Exec Forum as witnessed by your strategic feedback and mobilizing outreach by your respective teams   Chris & Chase ‚Äì your steadfast commitment to keeping things moving forward, positioning Workhuman at the forefront of thought leadership, and capitalizing on the momentum built in Atlanta  Amy & Jen P ‚Äì your strategic and creative feedback, guidance, and mentorship in the moments woven between the To Do List items  Kathryn & Abby ‚Äì your innate ability to collaboratively help me turn vision to value within your respective roles while simultaneously juggling your numerous other responsibilities. I am grateful for your time and for showing up and prioritizing the Exec Forum  Though we are just getting started together, we have already made great strides - which is cause to celebrate. Thank you for all that you do. Here's to the next phase!

title: Unleash is over!
message: I'm not sure any of you even had time to unpack from Atlanta before you had to re-pack for Vegas. Thank you for all you did for Unleash on-site and doing an amazing job to make this show happen. Safe travels back and hope everyone can enjoy their long weekend of well deserved rest!

title: Audit Complete!
message: A huge thank you to everybody involved with the 2021 EY Dublin Audit. EY signed off on our 2021 US GAAP financials last Friday ‚Äì this is a fantastic milestone to have reached and is the culmination of the massive effort and work put in by all. A huge amount of information was requested - detailed listings, reconciliations, sample selections, accounting memos, process documentation, explanations and then more queries and more samples! You all jumped in and delivered all information in a timely manner demonstrating great urgency throughout. Any follow up queries that subsequently came were also promptly addressed. When sample selections crossed multiple finance teams, fantastic teamwork was demonstrated ensuring everything was delivered comprehensively. We are now in a great position with the year end audit firmly behind us. Thanks again to you all for your co-operation and dedication in reaching this milestone ‚Äì great work all!

title: Finance Team
message: Just wanted to take a moment to thank my partners in Finance for the warm welcome and for taking the time to meet with me during my first couple of weeks at Workhuman. It was very helpful to understand your roles and teams more as I settle in to my new role and begin building relationships across the organization.

title: A leader who shines!
message: THANK YOU. Thank you for both encouraging me to jump into the deep end (immediately!) but also always being right there with a life vest and helping hand. Working through WHL breakouts, Mainstage, content and more in this whirlwind has been such a joyful learning experience and discovering and developing our team groove is really just the best. And seeing you command the stage with Priya Parker last week?? How cool, how inspiring - having leadership like yours and seeing you shine on that stage makes this job that much better. These past few weeks have been both fullfling and exhausting - but you are always ready to support and I cannot wait for all the exciting, creative things to come!

title: You helped a mom ‚Äúblow her daughter‚Äôs mind‚Äù
message: I want to thank you for your willingness to help a mom who reluctantly asked me to see if we could somehow get Simone Bile‚Äôs signature in her daughter‚Äôs second grade yearbook (which had a few pics of Simone). As she approached me after a session, she hesitantly pulled out the yearbook and showed me the page her daughter had bookmarked.    When she finished asking, I told her it can‚Äôt burt to ask and that I knew the perfect person to help. When I found you and explained the request you didnt hesitate to say you would try. As Simone‚Äôs session began, you calmy sat down and handed me the signed yearbook, as if you hadn‚Äôt just created a miracle for this mom amd her daughter.  As soon as the session ended I reached out to the mom. As she approached me I could already see the tears in her eyes. We shared a few watery eyed hugs. She asked if she could thank you (which is where I sneakily captured this picture and video). Her words were ‚ÄúI couldn‚Äôt be more thankful!‚Äù  ‚ÄúMy daughter‚Äôs mind is going to be blown (8 year old daughter had already asked dad to call mom and check in). She also indicated she had made the mistake of only buying a day pass and would be attending the entire conference next year. She shared that her colleague almost moved her family vacation so she could attend this year, because that is how much she loves Workhuman Live. I love that you closed the conversation by sharing where the conference would be next year and selling her on WHL in Dublin. But most of all I love that you helped create a ‚Äúpeak‚Äù moment (per Dan Heath) that this mom (Melissa Parks) will never forget! Thank you for representing what it looks like to work human!

title: Atlanta, Nailed It
message: Jill, Jeff ‚ÄìI want to thank you both for your unbelievable leadership, planning and execution of Workhuman Live Atlanta!  I have to say it felt incredible to be back, and throughout the entirety of the week I was reminded of just how far we‚Äôve come, in no small part to your tireless dedication and collaborative teamwork to get us to this point.  From registration ‚Äì ‚Äúhugging‚Äù that forecast line every step of the way, to the planning, pivoting, and replanning of our space utilization, activations, and COVID safety measures and protocols in the ever fluid environment we still find ourselves in, to the seemingly flawless execution of registration (!) this was a banner event from start to finish and I‚Äôm so thankful that you were both at the helm guiding us back to in-person reality.  You have now set a new bar, but I have no doubt you‚Äôll not only meet but exceed in the Workhuman Live events to come.  Well done and thank you again for all of your incredible work, and now onwards to Dublin and San Diego!

title: Setting the Stage Like a Pro
message: To our amazing group of humans who took the stage to announce each WHL breakout speaker - BRAVO!!! This role required poise, prep, guts (especially for anyone not used to big audience public speaking), and energy - engaging the audience and setting the stage for the speaker talent. No small feat! Amy kicked us off by introducing Priya Parker on Monday afternoon and when her heel stuck in the stage floor, she handled it like the pro that she is and showed us all "how it's done" with grace and humanity. Everyone truly stepped up (yes, pun intended) for last-minute fill-ins when needed, seizing new opportunities and rising to the occasion. Thank you all for your collaboration and flexibility, and for truly making the breakout experience so phenomenal!

title: WH EMEA  in Atlanta
message: Wendy & Jill , i want to say thank you to both of you for not only the amazing Workhuman live 2022 and all the work that went into it, but also for the support and advice that you proovided me along the way. Im well aware of the mammoth volume of work that goes into executing these events. I  had about 40 people travelling to Atlanta from Dublin who had many questions and queries and you made yourselves availble and helped with any queries i had to reassure the Dublin team. Not ony that, but you also provided me with contacts for  a coach big enough to transport our jolly crew back to the airport safely and helped make that a painless process by giving us use of a room to store our luggage until the bus arrived. This was such a help to me &  the Dublin team as they could go do some gift shopping or grab some food after the final Keynote and not worry about dragging luggage around, which was a nice end to their trip.  Thank you both for everything! what a week.

title: An unstoppable duo!
message: Wow! Wow! Wow! Amy and Jenna - first, thank you for being the best humans in general. Second - thank you both for taking me in and letting me learn, grow, and laugh with you. Third - thank you for elevating the WH brand, both at WHL and every other day of the year. As we continue to grow as a company I cannot wait to see the amazing work you continue to do to make Workhuman a household name.

title: WHL Strategic Accounts Team Success
message: HOTLANTA! Well done to this team of fabulous people! We got to reunite with old friends, new friends, and each other! You worked tirelessly to get the right customers to attend and really engage with us and it really paid off. I was so proud watching you all connect with our customers and see how proud they were to be hosted by you! Each of the customer speaking sessions was FAB! Mike Malloy could hardly contain himself‚Äîhe may want a fulltime gig! Even GE was beaming! So many customers from so many accounts‚Äîmany first timers! You all worked your tails off to be sure every customer felt great about their experience and managed to unearth some new insights and opportunities! Well done to each of you and to this fantastic team. You show up for each other and for customers in the very best way‚Ä¶every time. Cheers!!

title: Micro-Coaching Power Panel
message: Shout out to Sheri and Corbrina for facilitating and participating in a fantastic panel with Merck at Workhuman Live. The care and thought you put into the prep really showed throughout a the highly engaging and powerful session. There has been a transition in our contacts at Merck, which is never easy. After the panel, our newest customer contact said that she had been feeling on the outside of the Workhuman team, and now she feels fully involved and was really happy to be part of it. Thank you both for helping Merck shine at Workhuman Live!!

title: It takes a village
message: Corina and I want to thank all of you for everything that you did for us to make the partner community have a successful and amazing experience at Workhuman Live!!  From all of our last minute questions, details for the executive forum, attendee follow ups, conference room prep, ticket questions and more... you were all so extremely helpful and supportive.  We appreciate all of you for your hard work, positive attitudes and attentiveness to make great happen for this community.  Thank you for everything and more!

title: What a line up!
message: The first live event in 3 years, brand new to the team, major staffing changes, major keynote changes, and so many more obstacles in your way. You both ran nearly 60 speaking sessions as if none of that even existed. You stayed calm, executed plan Bs as if they were plan As, and delivered world-class content to 1,500 people. It was a master class in running a speaking program!

title: The Me for the We
message: Congratulations on a remarkable WHL Atlanta! Transparently, I struggled with this recognition as no amount of words would accurately summarize how I feel about each and every one of you. So, I‚Äôll keep it short. Good teams become great ones when the members trust each other enough to surrender the Me for the We. Your leadership throughout the planning and execution of WHL Atlanta was on show in full force and everyone was witness to its greatness. Your impact on the Workhuman business is immeasurable. Your collaboration and communication in good and tough times were timely and evident. Your impact on 1,500+ people was visibly life-changing (evident from ‚Äúugly cries to ugly laughs‚Äù and the glowing smiles throughout the event).   In the famous words of Nelson Mandela, ‚ÄúIt always seems impossible until it‚Äôs done!‚Äù I'm super proud of you.

title: A masterclass in leadership...
message: I want thank you all for your impeccable leadership. Although this was my first year leading registration, badges, check-in, and returning to in-person events for the first time in 3 years, you all showed poise, trust, and compassion through what can only be described as a tumultuous process. In my 10+ years with Workhuman, this was the most confident and supported I‚Äôve ever felt taking on a new project, especially one so publicly visible. You led me through all of the checks and balances and answered what I estimate to be north of 10,000 questions along the way. Every interaction was based on ensuring not only the success of the event but my own personal success and I cannot express how much this has meant to me. Even when tensions were high and frustration got the better of me, you remained focused on the goal and even justified the need for frustration at times. I thank you all from the bottom of my heart for not only your help and guidance, but for allowing me to bring as much of myself into this event as possible. I have no doubt that we will continue to accomplish great things as a team and I look forward to taking on the next challenge, together!

title: So much to say, so this is for being awesome!
message: Amy,  What a month! First, that Gallup survey! Wow! The fact that Fortune picked this up with the headline, "There‚Äôs a fairly inexpensive way companies can save millions in employee turnover costs" is amazing! Click and bait!!!!!!!!! That is perfect messaging and you just made Jason and the Sales team A LOT busier. Your leadership within Workhuman to navigate this project with Gallup was extraordinary. And the results were as good as we could have wanted. Every company on the planet should run to our website and ask for a demo with this report. And in your "spare time", you ensured our industry analysts attended our evening event at WH Live and wrote an incredible press release about our relationship with a long-time customer. You get things done - and the things you get done are meaningful and massively valuable! I appreciate your partnership!!

title: Belt Save!
message: Backstage. All Ready to Go. Simone Biles! Not So Fast! Where is my Black Belt?! Packed it. Can‚Äôt find It. Fashion Police Coming for Me for having mismatched belts and shoes. But then a lighthouse appears, two actually. Amy Rice sends out a Spark Signal. ‚ÄòNeed a Black Belt‚Ä¶waist size 33. Anybody, somebody?!?! Chris O‚ÄôSullivan sees the signal and responds immediately and comes to the stage and saves the day!!!! And as you can see in the photo, I have the belt and Simone was impressed!!!! Thanks to both of you!!!!!

title: Inspiring Hearts and Minds at Organon
message: Sheri  - I am simply going to let the words sent directly to you from CHRO, Aaron Falcione do all the talking! "Hi Sheri, thank you for being such a great host this week.  I didn't get the chance to fully express how much I've come to appreciate the partnership we are forming with Workhuman.  It's rare to find a team and an organization with such strong philosophical alignment.  Beyond that, I feel that you and the entire team are committed to our success and I've been at this game long enough to know how rare and special that is.  I look forward to building something special together at Organon.  It may sound a bit trite, but I sincerely believe that women around the world are counting on us and I'm happy that Workhuman is part of that mission.  Have a great rest of the week!! Aaron"

title: SOLI Analysis Accuracy!
message: Cam, thank you so much for jumping in and helping me out with the Corteva SOLI analysis. Despite everything else you had going on, you stepped right up and taught me a new formula in Excel that drastically reduced the amount of time and manual work we would've needed to struggle through. Multiple calls and plenty of Slack messages. We were able to provide a quick and accurate resolution for the client, and prevent anything else from going wrong. I appreciate you immensely!

title: Transformational Work!
message: Amy and Jenna,  Your due diligence and focus on the right outcomes for our business has landed us a powerful and impactful asset that we can use / reuse for many months to come.  Congratulations on getting the Gallup report over the finish line and for building a robust communications plan to lead the role of this report to the world. All your effort and tears (Jenna) will be worth it!

title: Got a minute? Or two hours?
message: Jill, I can't thank you enough for all the phone calls. The gut checks. The 'do you have a minute' replies and insightful thoughts back. You are all knowing on Workhuman Live and as I embark on attending my first event, I depend on you and you deliver. Thank you x100.

title: Bravo for 2021 Account Review Success!
message: Thank you to each one of you for an amazingly successful BMS Account Review.  Sheri - Thank you for always being a partner to me during the creation and planning of these reviews, and on the broader account too. The clients love hearing from you and know that your input and guidance is key to a successful program.  Danielle - I always appreciate our laughs while getting the slide layout ready.  You have such a depth of comms knowledge and strategy to share, and BMS really should just listen to it all.  Team Awards.... I can smell them coming!  Melissa - your polish and editing skills are unmatched.  Thank you for listening to what was needed and delivering it.   Alan - our WHIQ voice who brings the insights that BMS eats up.  Your deep dive into Ovation awards was welcomed and eye opening for certain.  Thank you for knowing this client so intimately and bringing eyebrow-raising content that truly engages the group.  Rick - You are always a wonderful partner to me and certainly to BMS as well.  e-Commerce is always on their mind with a specific focus this year into sustainability.  I appreciate your genuine care to share what your team has done and is doing this year to enhance the user experience and expand the reach of the Store. Adam - your first time joining the BMS Review gang and you crushed it, of course!  Thank you for waiting out nearly 2 hours of intense conversation to share your Product future state.  The team at BMS was completely intrigued!  Without this team, our Review would not have been nearly as impactful and interesting.  Thank you for all of your time and effort.

title: Speedy Interview Team
message: Thank you all for your help interviewing candidates for the Sr. Customer Comms Specialist role last week. From open req to offer out to candidate it was barely more than a week! in large part to Lynn having a great understanding of what I was looking for and some candidates already in mind. Fingers crossed the offer is accepted but I have no doubt you all communicated how great this opportunity is!

title: Continuous Improvement
message: Thank you for sharing your feedback on our Organon retrospect this morning. Change isn't easy, but if it's to improve our customer's experience and Workhuman's advancement, it's all worth it. As we learn together, we grow together.

title: The speediest interviews, ever!
message: I can't thank you enough for being so quick to share your very valuable time this week (and with so many things happening - less than two weeks from Live). You five were the perfect sounding board for the Speaker's Bureau interview process and all gave fantastic, helpful feedback and insight (and so fast!). For a variety of reasons our timeline needed to be expedited and you all were ready to jump in. Thank you!

title: All things WHL

message: Team! Way to go on being the first team to complete the CS Wiki scavenger hunt. We have so many valuable resources out on the CS Wiki, sometimes you just have to hunt a little to find them. Thank you for your enthusiastic participation and great job finding all of the items in the hunt so quickly!

title: Ain't nothing like getting together.....
message: Team - that was SO much fun, thank you to each and every one of you. It's a great company to work for, but what makes it even more special is the people. New and familiar faces bring all kinds of opportunities to connect, and I'm grateful I got the opportunity to spend time with all of you! Go, Sox!

title: One Gallup Poll at a time!
message: Amy, Jenna, and Sarah - After months of interviews, global surveys, internal stakeholder discussions, steerco meetings, press release drafts, etc., you organized the final readout of the Gallup Research findings to the executive team today. Aligning the research to our business objectives (current and future) is no an easy feat and you've managed to represent the challenges/opportunities clearly and gather the results we need to validate our story for years to come. With a few minor adjustments, I'm really excited to see these findings come to life in our content, at WHL, and in the press. Thank you all for your leadership, due diligence, and pursuit of organizational alignment. Well done!

title: Dream Team!
message: Jeff and Jill - This is long overdue but no less important as you both continue to shine each day as leaders and mentors. I appreciate everything you've both done to get the ball rolling on the 2022 Executive Forum and to bring me up to speed over the past month. The ExF portion of WHL is complex and requires immense attention to detail, and you kept things moving so that I could transition into my role a seamlessly as possible. From preparing key transition and event-specific documents to making time for countless "do you have a few minutes to talk about X?" meetings, it means so much to be on the receiving end of your support and advocacy as I prepare to take the ExF to the next level. Thank you also for the warm welcome in Framingham this past week and for making me feel like I was part of the team from the moment I walked through the door. The influence of your combined leadership of our team is evident in all aspects of our work and group dynamic. I feel so fortunate to have landed here.

title: A Royal Welcome
message: I appreciate you all making me feel so welcome on my first night (and first time ever visiting) Massachusetts!

title: Giddy Up for Gallup
message: Ladies- we're in the home stretch for the launch of the Gallup report. I want to recognize the outstanding work you both are doing to raise visibility of this partnership both internally and externally. Meetings are happening every single day to push this forward. I really appreciate your dedication and partnership. Let's do this!!!

title: IBM ‚ÄúMan On The Street‚Äù Shoot

The impact of this work will have a long-term and outsized impact on our business and relationship with IBM. Thank you for representing the Workhuman values to the fullest. title: Cam to the rescue (again)!
message: Cam, thank you so much for your help on analyzing the Corteva SOLI changes. You are always so helpful even if the issue is out of your scope of work and always have the customer front of mind. I appreciate everything you do and can't thank you enough!

title: Talk. Recognize. Reward. is Here!
message: To the incredible humans behind the Organon launch, Thank you!!! When I joined there was about less than a month until go live. Mark, you helped answer my many questions. Specifically, on how to make this launch impactful, not only to the core project team but to all founders. We adjusted the project plans and launch dates to achieve all items in this customers' scope of work. Joyce and Kim provided Organon teams with ample guidance and training materials. Ro and Sheri thank you so visionary with this launch Organon. Not only considering the benefit for Organon with Thrive but the influence this could have on other WH customers.  I'm eager to see the effects of this program in the upcoming months.  It is your dedication and expertise that led us to the finish line. There would be no Talk. Recognize. Reward. without you. Congratulations team!

title: Clean Harbors SOARing to New Heights!
message: CONGRATULATIONS to the entire Clean Harbors Launch Team!   Each and every member of this team contributed at a critical moments leading up to our April 4th.   This swift and successful launch gave birth many opportunities for growth, including bulk uploads, new R&R programs, possible Workhuman Certification (Enterprise) while fortifying the important goals of improving retention and engagement in their workforce with special (and Presidential) attention to their truck driver population.  Yes, on the day of launch, the Clean Harbors Program Manager was invited to the White House to discuss the importance of improving inclusivity and engagement for women and minorities in the trucking industry.   Our PR team, with little notice, turned around some talking points just in case preparation met opportunity for the PM to speak on behalf of Workhuman Cloud.  Clean Harbors kept us on our toes but in the end the Program Manager shared that in her 32 years of being a part of implementations, rarely if ever, has an implementation gone this smoothly.  An enormous thank you to each and every member of this team!!!!

title: A Well-Rounded View
message: Jill, Where do I start?!  Many thanks for all your support as we work through (and to!) Workhuman Live.  It must seem like Groundhogs day the number of times I ask the same question only to double- and triple-check I'm not missing anything and that I can be as mindful as possible on your side of the world!  You have been so patient.  Also, thank you for being so thoughtful, especially in helping us think through and inform us on other areas that may be important for us to keep in mind as we near WHL.  We don't know what we don't know.  You provide a thoughtful and well-rounded view into both of our worlds.  Thank you again!

title: All Hands on Deck
message: Huge THANK YOU to Peter, Brendan, Enda, Robert, Luka, Sheri, Chris, Mark and Amy for your support this weekend. Organon asked for urgent modifications to their program site for the soft launch on Monday morning. Each of you lent a hand in either coordinating with internal teams, updating scripts, running data loads and hot deploys, enabling the DKIM for their new email address, and performing testing in sandbox and production. You led hard conversations with our agency partners about competitive pressure and performance, onboarded a crisis management agency, and built mitigation plans to ensure business success. You both handled the conversations with honesty, transparency, and with a solution mindset. We‚Äôre getting stronger, more strategic, and therefore naturally expect bigger and better results. title: Go Team Red!

title: Quality is key!
message: I wanted to thank you all for your help in providing honest/ constructive feedback on our global account marketing materials. As we move into Q2, its important that we continue working as a team to create materials that provide the most value to our customers. Thank you for your continued partnership!

title: Goodbye QBR! Hello BPR!
message: Performance vs. Plan Weekly Meeting Team - WOW! What a quarter! We are pacing to 10,000 MQLs for Q1 vs. a forecasted goal of 8,500. On behalf of Richard and myself, we wanted to recognize this core group for your willingness to sunset old practices that no longer served our growth goals (we mean you QBR), and replace them with agile, current, and dynamic approaches to generating performance insights, actioning trends, and week on week tight management of forecasts, actuals, and course adjustments. This represents and important discipline and newly developed "muscle" from work that began way back in October 2021 in support of our aggressive growth goals. You invested significant cross-functional time to develop an integrated 2022 Marketing Plan. And you keenly recognized that the plan may not go as planned. So rather to wait and react, you all committed to this business performance review format and week after week dug in to the detail of what was working and what wasn't, and rapidly responded to correct or accelerate where needed. Thank you for charging at this big goal with pragmatism, confidence, and courage. Onward to Q2! With gratitude, Chris and Richard.

title: Challenging the Status Quo
message: Cam ‚Äì I love seeing meeting invites from you on topics I know will make a significant impact to both our team and our customers as we look to scale. Today‚Äôs meeting is a shining example of that. I want you to know that your mindset to challenge the status quo, to improve efficiently and to grow Customer Success strategically does not go unnoticed. We are at a stage we need to think differently, think boldly and take risks and it‚Äôs amazing and a pleasure to watch your ideas and your progress to achieve this big results!

title: GE - Building a World that Works! (Magic, People)
message: To quote GE's slogan "Building a world that works" - THIS TEAM takes it even further in supporting GE in building a world and employee experience that works, energizes, inspires and retains talent! Sheri! Oh, Sheri!! You made today's Strategic Review session possible. You have built such a trusted relationship with Tatsuki Matsuyama and Ellie Bartow and bam, secured this strategic meeting after a 4+ years drought! I've got to watch in awe as you have masterfully blended inspiring the GE and being inspired yourself to help support them with a massive company change moving from a single company into three separate companies in the next two years! Incredible, strategic and detailed work to get the mindset change, GE aligned with smaller value awards given more frequently, enable the company newsfeed across all business groups, leverage the platform as a communications tool and showcase the ROI of the Impact program - a program that's making a big difference! Alan, you brought the data to support the strategic direction in which the mindset, skill set and program design set needs to change in order to maximize GE's investment and proved with "ah ha" moments recognition is a super effective lever for creating connections and retaining talent! Tatsuki was hanging on your every word! Mark, you took over as the Senior Customer Success manager and haven't missed a beat. GE is very complex, has multiple key business groups, with multiple programs, eligibility rules and you make it all seem very simple and easy to manage! I love seeing the GE team smile and nod their heads when you're presenting. Super engaging and speaks volumes to the partnership you have created. Adam, sharing the product roadmap and the vision of the future brought fruitful conversation and GE's very interested in learning more about Workday integrations and being a pilot for Team Awards! Huge wins!!! You all are an inspiration to GE and me!!! You Rock!!

title: Spotlight Success
message: Team ‚Äì what a massive win on today‚Äôs Workhuman Spotlight event!  It was an absolute thrill to watch it.  Thank you for the ingenuity and reimagination that went in to concepting and planning this new ‚Äòtalk show edition‚Äô format, and for all of the detailed execution that went into todays broadcast.  You all nailed it!  From audience acquisition, to garnering fantastic talent for the show, to the ‚Äòon the Streets of New York‚Äô segment which I thought was a hit, to the carefully constructed questions and content to highlight the many opportunities and challenges facing HR today, not to mention the flawless streaming, it all came together extremely well and showcased our natural place as thought leaders and drivers of this important ‚Äòfuture of work‚Äô conversation.  Steve ‚Äì you handled the job of navigating the conversations with Laurie, Steve and yes, even the unscripted Gary Vaynershuk too, like an absolute pro. Thank you to this cross-functional team of trailblazers and innovators, and congratulations on a fantastic event!

title: Setting the Stage
message: Amy & Cara, Thank you for all your help and support working with the partner speakers.  These are a new category of speakers which also plants seeds for opportunities in the future.  Thank you for trying something new and different and seeing the connection of possibilities that link to the broader Workhuman!  Cara, you've done a tremendous job meeting with the various partner speakers and setting them up for success.  You provided the right amount of information and answered their questions.  They felt comfortable joining our event, especially in a world where we are just starting to come back in person.  You are also full of creativity in the different types of sessions they can have.  Amy, thank you for being an extension of the outside-of-the-box thinking!  Depending on the type of partner and topic, you helped walk me through different ideas and ways the partners could present and showcase their expertise virtually.  Several thought leaders had already signed up, and they're looking forward to being a part of it.  A special THANK YOU to both of you for this partnership and the ability to think BIG!

title: Truly Amazing Teamwork!!!
message: After working for something for such a long period of time, it's fun to look back and think of all the little steps along the way that got you to the finish line.  We recently were able to bring Seagate into the Workhuman Family, and it wouldn't have been possible without this amazing group of individuals helping make it a reality.  Thank you all for your support throughout this incredible journey, which includes - prep for meetings, meetings, custom demo's, marketing campaigns, a micro-site, more meetings, more demos, value creation sessions, Workhuman Live Speakers, RFP preparation and submission, a trip to Denver, references, finalist presentations, follow up meetings, security reviews, pricing discussions, negotiations, and I'm sure a few more that I can't even remember.  It takes a herculean effort to bring in a new customer on board, and you are all truly appreciated...thank you, thank you, thank you!!!

Thank you for being a great partner in helping to grow and evolve the market team and our approach.

title: Strong relationships lead to great things!
message: Sheri,  Thank you for (re)introducing us to our latest hire within the Customer Success team!   Over the years, you‚Äôve forged such strong relationships with our customers that you‚Äôve been able to deliver excellence to them while growing their programs.  In this case, a longtime Customer Program Lead had left the customer and later sought you out to see if Workhuman could be their next professional home. title: Thank you for continued success and reliability!
message: Cam & Jamie understand the needs of the customer while also adhering to WH's finance, business and legal internal policies.  This is an extremely difficult task to meet from both ends but they do this with ease. The partnership between Customer Success and Finance has grown significantly and I know I can always count on both of them for assistance/direction with understanding the customer's current situation; and their additional context is helpful with drafting new order forms and contractual conditions that fulfill customer immediate needs & WH policies and procedures simultaneously which ultimately renders greater cash flow, revenue recognition and overall profit to WH as a whole.  Additionally, their knowledge and continued support with communicating team awards (which tends to be more popular in the last year) and providing finance with the correct documents to properly review and approve these team awards have created a more efficient and effective internal request process. Above all, they also understand the finance, revenue and legal implications when proposing a new customer request to finance which is quite admirable.  Thank you for always being an integral part of WH's front end (and back end) operations process!  I look forward to working with both of you more in the future!

title: Q1 QBRs: a Fresh New Year!

title: Best in the game

You were able to secure three passes and the Rocket Companies team was more than excited. Gretchen said - "THANK YOU! This is FANTASTIC! I am super excited to attend this event and meet this team in person. I truly appreciate the passes!" I am so appreciative of your partnership and persistence on this. Thank you both for all the help and for being great teammates!

You are so generous with your time, expertise, and problem solving ability. I am so grateful for every conversation; your POV always makes me think - you make me better.

title: Ukraine Communication!
message: Wow! We could have done nothing like our competition - but that is not who we are or why we exist. In under 24hrs this group mitigated brand media risks, developed internal and external Comms in support of Ukraine, gained buy-in for WH to match 20K worth of donations, and drafted our company position on the terrible situation occurring in Ukraine. You united together, placed egos and hierarchy aside to impact millions who need it the most - As Kevin said, always assume positive intent and lead with our core values of respect!

title: Executive Presence

Having you there as an executive presence on the day was invaluable and im sure our old and new humans were happy to see you there to open up the Ignite offsite. thanks again, your calm and reassuring prescence was greatly appreciated and i hope you got to enjoy the experience too.

Thank you all I believe it was a great success and you all contributed and I was sorry to miss it! Next time.

title: Making the Remarkable Happen
message: Sheri,  In the spirit of Innovation = Imagination + Determination, the work you have done exemplifies this Workhuman Value.  You have done incredible work bringing Gratitude Summits to so many of your largest customers ‚Äì Merck, GE, ADP, Harman and Synchrony to name a few - which have significantly led to new executive relationships, increases in program activity and amplified awareness and ROI around the power of Gratitude and Recognition. Not only were you spreading Gratitude across organizations, you then brought out the best in their cultures by working with them to illuminate and promote Inclusiveness at both Merck and ADP.  In Merck‚Äôs case, they were just honored and awarded the Brandon Hall Excellence Award! Merck won Gold in ‚ÄúBest Advance in Rewards and Recognition Technology‚Äù for their company‚Äôs outstanding Workhuman Social Recognition program, INSPIRE, and the implementation of Inclusion Advisor to foster a more diverse and equitable workplace. AMAZING!!  Additionally, no small feat to bring all of this gratitude and inclusiveness to your customers, but you also recently signed a new 3-year Renewal with GE and secured the remainder of the WH Cloud for Organon in the last 2 weeks.  And to put a bow on it all, you brought Eric to the CHRO and his leadership team at GE in an innovative strategy session to have him say, ‚ÄúI never got how important recognition was until now!‚Äù  Beyond epic work Sheri!  You are such a star and I am beyond proud of your accomplishments and can‚Äôt wait to see what you crush in 2022!

title: And, we're off!

We've already closed 2 more huge customers on the Inclusion Advisor, have Gratitude Summits underway---and a backlog of demand!, and have identified major opportunities with steps toward closing them. From leading your team, solving challenges head-on to driving the development of channel-specific strategies for SEO, Social Media, Earned and Paid PR, and Content Marketing, you have set a solid foundation for a great FY22 and we're already making significant progress toward our strategy board goals. title: Make Way for Jill
message: There you are, leading; Nice hat! Over the past 2 days you have brought the team together multiple times to strategize and ideate and brainstorm and document and think think think. You know the world of events requires agility and courage and decision-making. You know the team is tired of Covid and the nonsense it brings (to work, and life... and to our event). You are strong. Well done!

No matter how it takes shape, I'm confident our event bring down the house.  So proud to work with this group of humans.

Thank you for being a sounding board and a partner as we expanded our SEO strategy, brought on an SEO agency, and created the brand dashboard. I'm really looking forward to working together in my new role to build on all the great things the team has been working on and will work on in the coming months!

title: Thank you for the support
message: Conor, I want to take this opportunity to thank you for all the support you have given to me since I joined Workhuman. This award is well overdue :) Since I have joined Workhuman you have given me the opportunity and freedom to work on various tasks/projects and allowed me to put my own stamp on things, which is fantastic and I am greatly appreciative of that. You operate an 'open door policy' whereby I can come to you if I have any questions or need advice/guidance and you are very generous with your time. You have so much knowledge of the business and how it operates at various level (from finance to commercial to operational) which helps me greatly when determining how best to approach a project or task to ensure my methodology aligns across the various functions (e.g. from a tax, finance, commercial and operational perspective). On a personal note, since joining remotely you and the rest of the Finance Team have made me feel very welcomed and part of a team. You have helped build a Finance Team which are friendly, helpful and strive for quality and a great reflection of what Workhuman is all about. I really enjoy working here and thanks for giving me the opportunity.

title: Thank you
message: Conor, I wanted to take a moment to recognize you for all that you have done this year, particularly the past 6 months. With some team changes happening you made sure that we not only remained connected but established more frequent and meaningful meetings in our calendar. from these i have had the benefit of your time, guidance & Feedback, This has enabled us to move on things quicker than before and keeps us aligned with future goals. Also to have the space to provide what i hope are more meaningful updates to you has been a welcome move weather it be day to day, task/project or personal related. i look forward to the year ahead. Thank you.

title: 2021 Gratitude
message: I just want to show my appreciation for all your help, support and guidance through what has been a year of change and growth, its much appreciated. Giving up so much time for collaboration, analysis, new processes, month end changes - your advice, know-how and time has been invaluable. Thanks and enjoy the award, Sean

title: jumping lanes
message: Almost all of the time I disagree with jumping roles (lanes) because it causes confusion and lack of ownership. This recognition is to applaud you for jumping a lane to step in to land our first celebrity speaker for Atlanta. There is a resource gap and you filled it. Great teamwork and dedication. Well done - this is a big deal!!

I just wanted to say thanks for the support this year. This has seemed like the busiest year since I joined and we have had a lot on across the Finance Team. This team is at the heart of all we do in Finance and without each of you the cogs wouldn't keep on turning (pun intended). Even down to the day to day things, like payments or FX, your support is second to none. I hope you all have a very Merry Christmas with your family and look forward to working with you all in 2022.

title: Flexibility on the Fly
message: Conor and Jim, I appreciate both of you for traveling to Dublin for two days to meet with me in order to solidify our 2022 planning initiatives. I had five days planned in Dublin to spend with you and your teams. But Covid had other plans....so we condensed everything into two days, taking necessary safety precautions, and were able to solidify important plans we need to scale Workhuman in 2022. You both traveled and ensured we were able to cover important topics so we would not fall behind. Thank you for your commitment and teamwork! On to 2022!

title: Team Connection and Cheer üåüüéÑ

title: PPT Takeover

The work that you have done preparing the documents and sending to Chris has been amazing, and your support has enabled me to focus on my new role.  I really appreciate everything that you do!

title: Communications Partners Extraordinaire
message: A big thank you to this mighty team of communications professionals for being fabulous partners in crime in 2021! We came together this year like we really haven't done before. Thanks to your leadership, Amy, you collaborated, recognized the need for deeper partnership, and organized the team to support our biggest customers with great co-marketing opportunities, valuable speaking opportunities, and set us up to have repeatable success in multiple formats. Our customers feel the partnership shift. Our Strategic Client Directors feel the partnership. Thank you to the whole team for stepping up, proposing great ideas, supporting great ideas, and delivering incredible content for all to leverage. We are better aligned to deliver the right messages at the right time, deliver the right speakers for the right opportunities, and really organized for the team to strike in the right moment. Many sincere thanks to each of you for your expertise and energy and commitment! Big things to come in 2022!

title: Cheers to you!
message: Amy - Thank you for an incredible year of support, realness, and overall growth. You have led the external comms team through some massive wins this year. Creating new functions, huge media hits, onboarding agencies, moving away from processes that no longer serve us, adopting new ones, and always‚ÄìALWAYS‚Äìfocusing on communicating with the team as much as possible. I have never worked with a leader who is more open to share information across the board as you, all in the name of keeping us informed for the better of the business. Something you've taught me since I first began reporting to you, last year and when I started reporting to you again this year (LOL), was to write down when you are trying something new. "Life moves pretty fast. If you don't stop and look around once in a while, you could miss it".  This Ferris Bueller quote comes to mind when I think of your advice here, because it's true. We move so fast in our day to day, that if we don't take the time to stop and look at where we are compared to 1 month or even a year ago, we will never recognize and appreciate the growth. It's a simple exercise that has a huge impact on confidence and appreciation for the journey. Thank you for an incredible year of growth, connection, and support. Grateful for all you do!

title: Lights, Camera, Action!
message: Thank you all for taking the time to come into the office on a Monday and be a part of the video for McGraw Hill. Consider this your official Oscar award from me for best background actors for a textbook video ever! I so appreciate the teamwork and the time you took out of your busy days to help.

title: There is a Superhero in all of us
message: Blown away again by his team's commitment to dropping everything to come together and use their collective talents to drive the business. Here's to all of you in celebration of teamwork!  When it matters most, we step up, rally the troops, and march right into the battle headfirst. Yesterday was another great example of what happens when you bring great minds together, the sparks fly, the ideas flow and suddenly we have a solution. There is a Superhero in all of us, we just have to put on the cape. Cheers to the team!

title: There is a Superhero in all of us
message: Blown away again by his team's commitment to dropping everything to come together and use their collective talents to drive the business. Here's to all of you in celebration of teamwork!
