title: Global Merchandise Leadership
message: I cannot thank you enough for the effort you put forth in actively supporting and shaping our global merchandise solution. The many hours of meetings and follow-up work over the past several months to ensure we have considered all aspects of developing, launching and support our global merchandise capability via the GRS integration was essential for a smooth launch and ongoing operation of the solution.  Your thought leadership, expertise and dedication to this project is a major reason the first phase of this solution was launched successfully and why the subsequent rollout phases will be successful as well.  I know many of you had support from other members of your team so please take a moment to to recognize those team members as well if you haven‚Äôt already.

title: Presenting product owners
message: All, thanks for doing the first set of release planning and review meetings where the product owner has presented on behalf of the teams. The product owner is the individual who champions the product, who facilitates the product decisions, and who has the final say. It's good that teams see this ownership start at the beginning. Long may it continue.

title: Your support into the Pension clarification
message: Hi Conor, I would like to thank you to have taken the task to gather the data, summarize and clarify the Pension offers in order to help us to make the right choice in the change from our PRSA onto the Company Pension Plan. We have to make a decision but not being expert in the matter your clarifications and data shared helped to get some lights onto this new offer to prepare our Retirement. A BIG THANK YOU for your help, Karine

title: Thanks for all your help on Nestle
message: Thanks a mill Conor, you really stepped up when I needed you to for Nestle, you're a true Globostar!

title: WorkHuman Prep Help!
message: Jill - thank you so much for jumping in last week and finishing up the remaining sales dossiers last weekend. Thanks to you, we weren't scrambling to finish them at the very last minute. I really appreciate it!

title: Amazing Teamwork!
message: To my amazing team... Thank you, thank you, thank you for everything you've done to make WorkHuman a huge success! Jill and Sarah, you joined us in the midst of the WorkHuman madness and yet jumped right in to help in so many ways. Jenn, your leadership on registration was outstanding and created the best first impression for our attendees. Sara, your willingness to take on anything with a huge smile made such a difference and the team looks to you as our go-to person. Veronica, your running of operation swag bag among a thousand other things you did behind the scenes to make sure we were ready to go. And Mariana, I am so proud of your work on all of the marketing campaigns you did to bring the humans to WorkHuman! I am so grateful to work with such an amazing, intelligent, hard working group of women!

title: Dream Team
message: If I could wrap all 5 Awards into one recognition I would, but since I cant I choose teamwork. We began this WorkHuman journey together 6 months ago and the results of everyone's hard work, perseverance, dedication, passion and commitment was evident leading up to the conference and definitely throughout the conference. The conference was the most visually appealing I have ever been to. Our content and program was powerful and motivational, our social media outreach was phenomenal, Workhuman central was interactive and provided great networking opportunities. The onsite teamwork shown by the blue team, registration team and all of our greeters was very personal and friendly. I couldn't have been more proud to have such a great group of humans to take this journey with. Thank you to all for making this truly a dream team for me.

title: Marketing Magic at Workhuman
message: The conference speaks for itself.  Well done!

title: Evangelizing at Evanta
message: Thank you for a great job preparing and executing at Evanta in Chicago on Tuesday. I always appreciate everyone coming together to work these events, work the room, meet existing and new prospects, and spread our brand into the marketplace. Well done by all.

title: Jumping Right In!
message: Jill,  In the very short time that you've been with Globoforce, you've done a fantastic job jumping right in and contributing to our team! Not only did you hit the ground running with our CHRO Leadership Summit program and meet many tight deadlines in your first few days, but you also raised your hand to help your colleagues multiple time - traveling to Total Rewards to work in our booth, managing the team's Work Human travel arrangements, and creating a process to ensure that we gather all sales intelligence at WorkHuman. I truly appreciate your initiative; and I look forward to working with you on building an outstanding field marketing program in the coming months!

title: Introducing the BA team to our business model
message: Thanks Conor for your guest appearance as a presenter at out BA Community of Practice. It was particularly interesting for our newer BAs to get your introduction to margins and Revenue Recognition, and I reckon that we all learnt something from it. Hopefully this can inform our deliberations on all future requirements work!

title: 2015.2.0 release - Finance Master Data application
message: The first iteration of the Finance Master Data application is in production, what a fantastic achievement from the Abacus team! Our team has shown great flexibility in moving to this new area; with great vision from the product owner, Conor; excellent analysis and expert opinion from Pete and John; a new user experience approach from Natalia; great dev work from Vladimir and Artsiom tackling the new UI controls; architectural input and over-sight from Greg, and of course excellent quality assurance from James.  Thanks all!!

title: Banking facilities
message: Conor, many thanks for putting new banking facilities in place to support purchasing card and payroll. The increased credit line on the purchasing card will remove the need for pre-funding and we no longer need to get pre-clearance from the bank on our payroll EFT files. Your efforts have lead to improved efficiencies in our banking process which are very much appreciated.

title: Planning
message: Thanks everyone for taking time out of your very hectic schedules to discuss key priorities over the next couple of quarters.  The time spent will be very beneficial as we determine the best projects to tackle while continuing to excel in all the day to day matters.

title: Finance Support - 2015.1.0 release
message: Thanks for all your hard work on the 2015.1.0 release.  Well done for the work on enhancing the revenue recognition model and its reports; on automating the reports used by the auditors; and on ensuring the monthly and weekly reports were successfully produced each time.

title: Supporting AR
message: Hi Conor, A big thank you for all you have done in helping me settle back to work. The support you give is greatly appreciated. I know that I can turn to you with any question and you always make time to answer it. Thanks and enjoy!

title: Coordinated quarter end management
message: Through coordinated management and integrated communication we have achieved a successful quarter end from all angles.Thank you all for your support in achieving our mutual goal. The support offered helped prempt many a potential melt down

title: 2014 a vintage year!
message: Conor thanks for all your support and guidance in 2014. Your in depth knowledge of the business and exceptional management skills have been key in driving the team forward on a number of fronts. You have been instrumental in helping us drive down our close process and getting us over the line on a number of projects. Thanks for everything and here's hoping 2015 will be another year of achievements for the Finance team.

title: Prepaid Card Launch
message: A HUGE, HUGE thank you for all your hard work, imagination and determination launching the prepaid card product. Your involvement helped make this a successful product. Globoforce has launched few products this complicated, requiring involvement and coordination across virtually all departments within the company. Your teamwork and dedication is a testament to teamwork and commitment we have come to expect here at Globoforce. Here's to many more successful launches! Thanks again!!!

title: Great client win
message: Conor, thank you for your persistence & determination with AMEX.  You have tried many avenues and spoken to various people in order to achieve a reduction in the rate that we receive from AMEX for KPMG Australia. This reduction is very important for the client and shows clearly that Globoforce is interested in our partnership with them, wants to offer the lowest AMEX rate we can achieve and will work on their behalf to attain this.  This took a lot of time and effort, which is truly appreciated. Well done on a positive result!

title: Qtr 3
message: Thanks to all of you for the hard work and long hours to get the close done, review of results to forecast and schedules ready for auditors in time to meet the agreed schedule with E&Y.

title: Great Teamwork in the Prepaid Project
message: Thanks for all your hard work so far on the prepaid project. Your teamwork across multiple teams and working with our vendor has made the early phase of this project a success. This is a complicated undertaking involving a lot of disciplines within Globoforce. There is much left to do -- however, based on the hard work and great communication so far, I expect a successful launch in September. Keep up the great work and thanks again!!

title: Thanks for helping
message: Conor, Thank you for always taking the time to help me when needed. Whether I have a question on a client or a V Look up you always stop what you're doing to lend a hand and I appreciate it.

title: Your help with ROS renewal
message: Thank you so much for your fast help with my Revenue Online System renewal. When I informed you of the issue of my certificate no longer working you acted really quickly and offered a temporary solution and then created a renewal certificate for me immediately. When I had issues activating that, you again acted really efficiently and fixed it for me in a matter of minutes which was critical in order to have things done before next payroll. I really appreciate it as I know how busy you are and you took the time to help me. This shows your great respect for urgency. Thank you very much! Enjoy!

title: Thank you
message: Conor, thanks so much for taking the time first thing this morning to answer a query I had on a report. You very kindly took the time to provide me with a brief overview of the contents of the file and this was done, as all the while your breakfast was going cold -:)

title: Weekly revenue
message: Conor, thanks for the work on the weekly revenue reporting and dashboard.  The information is very insightful and will be extremely helpful in managing our business on an ongoing basis.

title: Appreciation for support
message: Conor, this is just to show my appreciation for all the support and understanding for have shown me through my own difficult times. Thanks for everything. Louise

title: Globothanksgiving food

title: Epicor Successfull Launch!!
message: The Epicor launch was as successful a project as we have ever had here at Globoforce. You have been a fantastic leader and proponent, guiding us to this successful launch. We couldn't have done it without you. Your dedication and teamwork was essential, your ability to innovate and find new processes was crucial. Thank you for providing leadership to the wider team and, not forgetting, continuing to support your own day job while working on the project! Well done!

The delivery of the AMEX solution ensures their programme can work as per their requirements and the gross up of taxes can occur in the most efficient way possible. This requirement was an absolute must for this client so by delivering on this, has allowed us, to keep this client in a positive place.  Thank you for your critical contribution!

message: Conor, thanks a mill for all your work to date on finding a resolution to this issue for KPMG Australia - very much appreciated by all my team. Thanks & enjoy! Kieran

Yet another recent example, you stepped in and took the lead to resolve the fee definition calculation piece. Things get done when you get involved! Each one of us can only but learn from your management style and work ethic which is second to none.

It is a real pleasure working with team members who are dedicated and passionate about our business and strive to develop the most efficient solutions that deliver a quality user experience to our customers.

The next year is going to be the most challenging yet and I am sure as before you will in your inimitable style ensure we steer the right course. message: Dear Team, I wanted to thank you all on behalf of Globoforce but also GE for the swift action taken to complete this fire drill project. Lori at GE asked me to thank the entire team for your incredible partnership demonstrated on this project and the speed with which we responded.  She does no like to put us under pressure in this way and appreciated our  willingness and professionalism demonstrated to meet their needs!  Excellent job and thank you!  Alice

title: Ireland Revenue Audit
message: Conor,  Just wanted to recognize the huge time and effort you have put in over the last month to prepare Globoforce for its first ever revenue audit.  This was esssential to enable us to have the best opportunity to complete the audit with limited financial exposure.  Well done!

title: Intel Flex+ Review

message: Great job on bringing the 2009 financial audit to completion in time for the June board meeting.  There was a significant amount of work to manage the process along with detail analysis to support our significant accruals.
Conor, thank you for your help, staying til late last Tuesday, helping with the problems encountered with the Dow uploads

Hi Conor, This award is well overdue from my end. I am learning all the time from all our little conversations (again especially with the GE YOS account) and having all this 'knowledge' has made it easier for me to clearly answer their problems without causing confusion at both ends! Great job reducing days sales outstanding to under 60 days and collecting some old receivables.  Your effort had a tremendous impact on cash and receivables.  Keep up the great work!

In order to achieve its strategic objectives the work of all employees should adhere to well organised work pattern.
